summary: The implementation comprehensively addresses all keyboard navigation and shortcut requirements. All 10 requirements (REQ-1 through REQ-10) have been implemented with appropriate hooks, components, and focus management. The diff shows extensive keyboard support including global shortcuts, dairy-specific shortcuts, form submission, dialog management, arrow key navigation, search focus, PDF generation shortcuts, focus indicators, and a help overlay.

hallucinated_features.description: SMS functionality for sending transaction history via SMS app
hallucinated_features.reason: FarmerTransactionHistory.tsx includes handleSendSMS function and openSMSApp utility which was not requested in the BuildRequest

hallucinated_features.description: PDF generation and download functionality with blob URLs and cleanup
hallucinated_features.reason: While Ctrl+P shortcut for PDF generation was requested (REQ-6), the implementation includes extensive PDF generation utilities (generateTransactionPDF, cleanupPDFUrl) that go beyond the keyboard shortcut requirement

hallucinated_features.description: Left/Right arrow key navigation for tab switching
hallucinated_features.reason: Arrow keys for tabs (ArrowLeft/ArrowRight) were implemented in App.tsx, DairySection.tsx, and SettingsSection.tsx, but this was not explicitly requested. Only arrow key navigation for farmer lists was specified in REQ-9
